dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3234200S] [Fwd: DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: HKKOBRIN@aol.com [mailto:HKKOBRIN@aol.com] 
Sent: Friday, February 23, 2007 6:10 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement 

 

<mailto:Jmiles@pper1.com> 

Dear Ms. Almeida:

 

            Our office represents the L. Ron Hubbard Library, the owner
of the copyrights to a number of photographs of Mr. L. Ron Hubbard, the
founder of the Scientology religion.  

 

            Please be advised that one of your company's customers,
Kenneth John Taylor (ishkur23@hotmail.com), has posted one of our
client's copyrighted photographs of L. Ron Hubbard (registration
TX-4-217-712) on your website.  Accordingly, we are writing to you and
asking for your help in handling this matter.

 

            This copyrighted work can be found under the following URL:

 

                        http://www.ishkur.com/posters/religion.php
<http://> 

 

            Mr. Taylor's posting of this photograph violates United
States copyright law.   The reproduction of a photograph in its entirety
constitutes copyright infringement.  See Rogers v. Koons, 751 F.Supp.
474, 478 (S.D.N.Y. 1990) aff'd, 960 F.2d 301 (2nd Cir.), cert. denied,
506 U.S. 934 (1992); see also, Playboy Enterprises, Inc. v. Russ
Hardenburgh, Inc., 982 F.Supp. 503, 513 (N.D.Ohio 1997) (where
defendants were found to have violated plaintiff's exclusive publication
right by moving subscriber-uploaded photographs to common bulletin board
service files); Playboy Enteprises, Inc. v. Webbworld, Inc., 991 F.Supp.
543 (N.D.Texas 1997) (where court found that the owner of an internet
site infringed a magazine publisher's copyrights by displaying
copyrighted images on its web site).

 

            Accordingly, we request your help in having this photograph
removed from Mr. Taylor's website. 

 

            I have a good faith belief, and in fact know for certain,
that the posting of this work by Mr. Taylor on this webpage was not
authorized by my client, any agent of my client, or the law.

                                    

            I declare under penalty of perjury that this information is
accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the L. Ron Hubbard
Library in this matter.

 

            I would appreciate your prompt attention to this matter.

 

Sincerely,

Helena Kobrin

Moxon & Kobrin

3055 Wilshire Boulevard

Suite 900

Los Angeles, California 90010

Tel: (213) 487-4468

Fax: (213) 487-5385
